⚠️ **Before submitting**

- AIMMS is a one-time purchase desktop application.
- There is no guaranteed support, response time, or fix schedule.
- Issues are reviewed and addressed at the developer’s discretion, when time permits.
- Submitting an issue does not guarantee a response or resolution.

If you are comfortable with this, please continue.
